about_the_game:
A special boost for anyone hoping to increase their focus generation! With this, your focus generation will be increased by 5x, allowing you to unlock more tech faster! Perfect also for anyone wanting to help with the development of the game.

You can enable or disable boosts in the Advanced Options Menu. When boosts are enabled, an icon will display in the lower left of the screen for your convenience.
